definition: vice-chairman (of an organization)/vice president (of a company)/deputy governor (of a bank)
secondary/auxiliary/deputy/assistant/vice-/abbr. for 副詞|副词 adverb/classifier for pairs, sets of things & facial expressions
to cut out (as a dress)/to cut/to trim/to reduce/to diminish/to cut back (e.g. on staff)/decision/judgment

sentences.english: Enter the recently named Vice President, Lieut.
sentences.chinese: 输入最近任命为副总裁，上尉。

sentences.english: In addition, Wal-Mart China Human Resources Senior Vice President Wang Yujia resigns.
sentences.chinese: 此外，沃尔玛中国人力资源高级副总裁王渝佳已辞职。

sentences.english: Wang joined Qualcomm in 2001 as a senior vice president.
sentences.chinese: 2001年汪静作为高级副总裁加入高通公司。

sentences.english: He was a motivational speaker, and vice president of a large company.
sentences.chinese: 他是一位富于鼓动性的演说家，一家大公司的副总裁。

sentences.english: P. of finance and strategy for Campbell Soup's North American division.
sentences.chinese: 康宝浓汤北美分部的金融与策略副总裁杰若罗德说。

sentences.english: But I have a breakfast meeting with the VP tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 但是明天我有一个和副总裁的早餐会啊。

sentences.english: Many CFOs and vice presidents can't answer it.
sentences.chinese: 许多首席财务官和副总裁也不能回答。

sentences.english: The vice-presidents were all square pegs in round holes.
sentences.chinese: 各位副总裁也都安排得不得其所。

sentences.english: Newcombe was promoted to vice president.
Leng Yanling, the senior vice president of Langchao Group Co.
sentences.chinese: 冷严凌，浪潮集团有限公司高级副总裁。

sentences.english: The following appeared in a memo from the vice president of a company that builds shopping malls throughout the country.
sentences.chinese: 下面是修建镇内所有购物中心的公司副总裁的备忘录。

sentences.english: But I have a breakfast meeting with the V.P. tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 但是已经和副总裁约了明天的早餐。

sentences.english: EXAMPLE: Now I'm only an assistant manager at my company, but after a couple years I hope to be a veep.
sentences.chinese: 我在公司只是个副经理，但我希望过两年成为副总裁。

sentences.english: Shen Haoyu of vice-president of Baidu business operation expresses.
sentences.chinese: 百度商业运营副总裁沈皓瑜表示。

sentences.english: Mr. Yu was appointed vice-president of the Company in October 2008.
sentences.chinese: 2008年任中国外运股份有限公司副总裁。

sentences.english: Former VP of Google, Kai-Fu Lee is an icon of success in China.
sentences.chinese: 在中国，前谷歌副总裁，李开复，是成功的典范。

definition: head/director (of an organizational unit)/(police) commissioner/inspector-general/rank of local governor in Tang dynasty administration
executive/senior management/(contraction of 高級管理|高级管理)
